entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
